comments:
When attempting to retrieve a list of branches, the following error is  
generated:  
   
"repository error     
org.eclipse.stellation.repos.database.WrappedSQLException: Error retrieving    
branch version comment java.sql.SQLException: ERROR:  Relation "tbv" does not    
exist    
   	at    
org.eclipse.stellation.repos.LocalHandle.getBranchVersionComment(LocalHandle.java:1337)   
" 
 
I have traced through the LocalHandle code, and _db.executeQueryStatement is 
throwing a WrappedSQLException with the message cited. 
 
The version under test is Bugzilla-32290. 
 
The bug likely occurs with getBranchComment as well. 
Note: it's possible that a branch revision comment was not entered (I will 
check), but in this case I would expect an empty string to be returned (as was 
previously the case) rather than needing to catch an exception.

This is already fixed as a part of my work-in-process on 31915.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 31915 ***
